title: Greek Bible manuscripts online
content:
[http://goodspeed.lib.uchicago.edu/home.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012040639/http:/goodspeed.lib.uchicago.edu/home.html)   
   
This is one of the best I have seen of the growing number of online manuscript resources. The navigation is well thought out and the resolution is very impressive.

 [‹ Metal type?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012040639/http:/typophile.com/node/10451 "Go to previous forum topic") [Typographic Color ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012040639/http:/typophile.com/node/10246 "Go to next forum topic")
author: John Hudson

comments.content:
Indeed, it's very very impressive.   
It could make me wish to have lived 40 years in the future with all New Testament and later manuscripts at hand through this instrument.
